item.title: Talks
item.description: 0 TALKS ON YŌGAVĀSIṢṬHA By Prof. A Satyanarayana Shastry Edited by G S Radhakrishnan TALKS ON YŌGAVĀSIṢṬHA Delivered by Prof. A Satyanarayana Shastry Editor Garani S Radhakrishnan 1054, 9th Main, Vijaya Bank Layout, Bilekahalli, Bengaluru 560 076. Tel: 080 26480026; e-mail: rgarani@gmail.com Published by Followers of Shastriji First Edition 2017 © Editor Pages xi + 245 Size 1/8th Demy Paper 70 gsm maplitho Price For internal circulation only Cover design Anup Vinay, AV Creative International 623/9, 1st B Main Road Jayanagar 7th Block West Bengaluru 560070.
